bonus.value: Increase speed of obtaining weapon charge by 10%/12.5%/15%.

mind.name: Assembly Line
mind.desc: Who can explain to her that she has been toiling away for a long time now?

memory.name: Surgical Scar
memory.desc: Aberrations cannot be reversed. Just like post-surgery scars, you don't get a chance.

belief.name: Armband
belief.desc: As a doctor, you cannot turn away, cannot be complacent, cannot be helpless.

emotion.name: Sleeping Pill
emotion.desc: She has insomnia from not wanting to face the dead in her dreams.
